textTemplates.description: Text Template Is Used in Case Notification Action.
textTemplates.name: Case_Status_Change_Notification_Template
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Owner.FirstName} {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Owner.LastName} 

This is in reference to case no {!$Record.CaseNumber}

The Status of the case has changed from {!$Record.Status} to {!$Record__Prior.Status}.

Please reach out to the owner - {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName} for the case for any clarification.
